me.stuartphillips.plugins

Class Transmitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.stuartphillips.plugins.Transmitter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Transmitter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class sets up an independent thread for card polling, and is linked to the setOnPiccResponseApduAvailableListener callback function

      • Transmitter

        public Transmitter(AudioJackReader mReader,
           AudioManager mAudioManager,
           CallbackContext mContext,
           int timeout,
           byte[] apdu,
           int cardType)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        mReader: - AudioJack reader service
        mAudioManager: - system audio service
        mContext: - context for plugin results
        timeout: - time in seconds to wait for commands to complete
        apdu: - byte array containing the command to be sent
        cardType: - the integer representing card type
